@imthenull wrote:

Pompano21:

Hi Zack, not spoke in ages.<3 I will try get on msn a bit more often.

But it does look nice, so good job.[/quote]
Lol yeah, those are apart of Jagex’s abuse system, and i was replicating theirs.

And thanks

item.title: Updated Abuse Report
item.description:
@5_1 wrote:

[quote=“imthenull, post:5, topic:401331”][quote author=5 1 link=topic=498393.msg3644902#msg3644902 date=1309302899]

Looks like rs2. Add in a change player option.

Just press cancel?

I haven’t tested this but… On RSC it was annoying to accidentally click or type in the wrong stuff and then have to go ALLLL The way back and start over… Should add a “back” option that saves previous stuff
[/quote]
You just press cancel, right click on the player “report abuse” click ok, and select what to report for?? how is that “way back”? It’s a 3 step process[/quote]
that’s like going to outer space and back man, cmon

Read full topic

item.title: Updated Abuse Report
item.dc:creator: @imthenull imthenull
item.description:
@imthenull wrote:

Hey guys, long time no see. I was looking though posts here, and found a YouTube channel that someone posted, which has alot of RSC videos on it. I saw that there was a new report gui, and loved it. So I wrote the same, completely from scratch. Here’s what it looks like.


This did only take a couple hours to write, notice there are some flaws (I’m not sure how this would look on other machines, since my fonts are different) such as in the second picture, the gap on the right is larger than on the left. Anyway, here’s the code.

Add this to the mudclient

[code=java] /**
* Abuse Report
* by Hikilaka
*/
private long lastReport;

private int showAbuseBox = 0;

private String offender = "";

private boolean isOkToReport() {
	return (System.currentTimeMillis() - lastReport) >= 60000;
}

public void setLastReport() {
	lastReport = System.currentTimeMillis();
}

private void handleAbuseClick(int type) {
	showAbuseBox = 0;
	if(!isOkToReport()) {
		displayMessage("You already sent a snapshot under 60 secs ago! Do not abuse this system", 3, 0);
		return;
	}
	setLastReport();
	super.streamClass.createPacket(230);
	super.streamClass.addTwo4ByteInts(DataConversions.usernameToHash(offender));
	super.streamClass.addByte(type);
	super.streamClass.formatPacket();
	offender = "";
}

public static String capitalizeString(String string) {
	  char[] chars = string.toLowerCase().toCharArray();
	  boolean found = false;
	  for (int i = 0; i < chars.length; i++) {
	    if (!found && Character.isLetter(chars[i])) {
	      chars[i] = Character.toUpperCase(chars[i]);
	      found = true;
	    } else if (Character.isWhitespace(chars[i]) || chars[i]=='.' || chars[i]=='\'') { // You can add other chars here
	      found = false;
	    }
	  }
	  return String.valueOf(chars);
	}

private final void openAbuse() {
	super.inputText = "";
	super.enteredText = "";
	showAbuseBox = 1;
	if(!offender.equals(""))
		super.inputText = offender;
}

private final void drawAbuseName() {
	int x2 = ((windowWidth / 2) + 180) - ((windowWidth / 2) - 180);
	gameGraphics.drawBox((windowWidth / 2) - 175, (windowHeight / 2) - 15, x2, 67, Colors.BLACK);
	gameGraphics.drawBoxEdge((windowWidth / 2) - 175, (windowHeight / 2) - 15, x2, 67, Colors.WHITE);
	int x = windowWidth / 2, y = windowHeight / 2;
	gameGraphics.drawText("Enter the name of the player you wish to report:", x, y, 1, Colors.YELLOW);
	y += 20;
	gameGraphics.drawText(super.inputText+ "*", x, y, 4, Colors.WHITE);
	if (super.enteredText.length() > 0) {
		offender = super.enteredText.trim();
		super.inputText = "";
		super.enteredText = "";
		showAbuseBox = 2;
	}
	y += 15;
	int okColor = Colors.WHITE, cancelColor = Colors.WHITE;
	if(super.mouseX >= (x - 30) && super.mouseX <= (x - 10) && super.mouseY >= 192 && super.mouseY <= 205) {
		okColor = Colors.YELLOW;
		if(mouseButtonClick != 0 && super.inputText.length() > 0) {
			mouseButtonClick = 0;
			offender = super.inputText.trim();
			super.inputText = "";
			super.enteredText = "";
			showAbuseBox = 2;
		}
	} else if(super.mouseX >= x && super.mouseX <= (x + 42) && super.mouseY >= 192 && super.mouseY <= 205) {
		cancelColor = Colors.YELLOW;
		if(mouseButtonClick != 0) {
			mouseButtonClick = 0;
			super.inputText = "";
			super.enteredText = "";
			showAbuseBox = 0;
		}
	}
	gameGraphics.drawText("OK", x - 20, y, 1, okColor);
	gameGraphics.drawText("Cancel", x + 20, y, 1, cancelColor);
}
private final void drawSelectAbuse() {
	int x = windowWidth / 2, y = 135;
	int[] secondX = { 185, 325 }, thirdX = { 330, 470 };
	gameGraphics.drawBox(36, 35, 440, 275, Colors.BLACK);
	gameGraphics.drawBoxEdge(36, 35, 440, 275, Colors.WHITE);
	y = 50;
	gameGraphics.drawText("This form is for reporting players who are breaking our rules", x, y, 1, Colors.WHITE);
	y += 15;
	gameGraphics.drawText("Using it sends a snapshot of the last 60 secs of activity to us", x, y, 1, Colors.WHITE);
	y += 15;
	gameGraphics.drawText("If you misuse this form, you will be banned.", x, y, 1, Colors.ORANGE4);
	y += 25;
	gameGraphics.drawText("Click on the most suitable option from the Rules of RuneScape.", x, y, 1, Colors.YELLOW);
	y += 15;
	gameGraphics.drawText("This will send a report to out Player Support team for investigation.", x, y, 1, Colors.YELLOW);
	y += 20;
	int x3 = windowWidth - 110;
	gameGraphics.drawText("Honour", 110, y, 4, Colors.RED);
	gameGraphics.drawText("Respect", x, y, 4, Colors.RED);
	gameGraphics.drawText("Security", x3, y, 4, Colors.RED);
	y += 20;
	int color1 = Colors.WHITE, color2 = Colors.WHITE, color3 = Colors.WHITE,
	color4 = Colors.WHITE, color5 = Colors.WHITE, color6 = Colors.WHITE,
	color7 = Colors.WHITE, color8 = Colors.WHITE, color9 = Colors.WHITE,
	color10 = Colors.WHITE, color11 = Colors.WHITE, color12 = Colors.WHITE,
	color13 = Colors.WHITE, color14 = Colors.WHITE;
	
	gameGraphics.drawBoxEdge(40, 149, 140, 25, Colors.GREY);
	if(super.mouseX >= 40 && super.mouseX <= 180 && super.mouseY >= 149 && super.mouseY <= 174) {
		color1 = Colors.ORANGE;
		gameGraphics.drawBoxAlpha(40, 149, 140, 25, Colors.WHITE, 75);
		if(mouseButtonClick != 0) {
			mouseButtonClick = 0;
			handleAbuseClick(1);
		}
	}
	gameGraphics.drawText("Buying or", 110, y, 0, color1);
	gameGraphics.drawText("selling an account", 110, y + 9, 0, color1);
	gameGraphics.drawBoxEdge(185, 149, 140, 25, Colors.GREY);
	if(super.mouseX >= 185 && super.mouseX <= 325 && super.mouseY >= 149 && super.mouseY <= 174) {
		color7 = Colors.ORANGE;
		gameGraphics.drawBoxAlpha(185, 149, 140, 25, Colors.WHITE, 75);
		if(mouseButtonClick != 0) {
			mouseButtonClick = 0;
			handleAbuseClick(7);
		}
	}
	gameGraphics.drawText("Seriously offensive", x, y, 0, color7);
	gameGraphics.drawText("language", x, y + 9, 0, color7);
	gameGraphics.drawBoxEdge(thirdX[0], 149, 140, 25, Colors.GREY);
	if(super.mouseX >= thirdX[0] && super.mouseX <= thirdX[1] && super.mouseY >= 149 && super.mouseY <= 174) {
		color12 = Colors.ORANGE;
		gameGraphics.drawBoxAlpha(thirdX[0], 149, 140, 25, Colors.WHITE, 75);
		if(mouseButtonClick != 0) {
			mouseButtonClick = 0;
			handleAbuseClick(12);
		}
	}
	gameGraphics.drawText("Asking for or providing", x3, y, 0, color12);
	gameGraphics.drawText("contact information", x3, y + 9, 0, color12);
	y += 30;
	int y2 = 179;
	gameGraphics.drawBoxEdge(40, y2, 140, 16, Colors.GREY);
	if(super.mouseX >= 40 && super.mouseX <= 180 && super.mouseY >= y2 && super.mouseY <= y2 + 16) {
		color2 = Colors.ORANGE;
		gameGraphics.drawBoxAlpha(40, y2, 140, 16, Colors.WHITE, 75);
		if(mouseButtonClick != 0) {
			mouseButtonClick = 0;
			handleAbuseClick(2);
		}
	}
	gameGraphics.drawText("Encouraging rule-breaking", 110, y, 0, color2);
	gameGraphics.drawBoxEdge(secondX[0], y2, 140, 16, Colors.GREY);
	if(super.mouseX >= secondX[0] && super.mouseX <= secondX[1] && super.mouseY >= y2 && super.mouseY <= y2 + 16) {
		color8 = Colors.ORANGE;
		gameGraphics.drawBoxAlpha(secondX[0], y2, 140, 16, Colors.WHITE, 75);
		if(mouseButtonClick != 0) {
			mouseButtonClick = 0;
			handleAbuseClick(8);
		}
	}
	gameGraphics.drawText("Solicitation", x, y, 0, color8);
	gameGraphics.drawBoxEdge(thirdX[0], y2, 140, 16, Colors.GREY);
	if(super.mouseX >= thirdX[0] && super.mouseX <= thirdX[1] && super.mouseY >= y2 && super.mouseY <= y2 + 16) {
		color13 = Colors.ORANGE;
		gameGraphics.drawBoxAlpha(thirdX[0], y2, 140, 16, Colors.WHITE, 75);
		if(mouseButtonClick != 0) {
			mouseButtonClick = 0;
			handleAbuseClick(13);
		}
	}
	gameGraphics.drawText("Breaking real-world laws", x3, y, 0, color13);
	y += 19; y2 += 19;
	gameGraphics.drawBoxEdge(40, y2, 140, 16, Colors.GREY);
	if(super.mouseX >= 40 && super.mouseX <= 180 && super.mouseY >= y2 && super.mouseY <= y2 + 16) {
		color3 = Colors.ORANGE;
		gameGraphics.drawBoxAlpha(40, y2, 140, 16, Colors.WHITE, 75);
		if(mouseButtonClick != 0) {
			mouseButtonClick = 0;
			handleAbuseClick(3);
		}
	}
	gameGraphics.drawText("Staff impersonation", 110, y, 0, color3);
	gameGraphics.drawBoxEdge(secondX[0], y2, 140, 16, Colors.GREY);
	if(super.mouseX >= secondX[0] && super.mouseX <= secondX[1] && super.mouseY >= y2 && super.mouseY <= y2 + 16) {
		color9 = Colors.ORANGE;
		gameGraphics.drawBoxAlpha(secondX[0], y2, 140, 16, Colors.WHITE, 75);
		if(mouseButtonClick != 0) {
			mouseButtonClick = 0;
			handleAbuseClick(9);
		}
	}
	gameGraphics.drawText("Disruptive behavior", x, y, 0, color9);
	gameGraphics.drawBoxEdge(thirdX[0], y2, 140, 16, Colors.GREY);
	if(super.mouseX >= thirdX[0] && super.mouseX <= thirdX[1] && super.mouseY >= y2 && super.mouseY <= y2 + 16) {
		color14 = Colors.ORANGE;
		gameGraphics.drawBoxAlpha(thirdX[0], y2, 140, 16, Colors.WHITE, 75);
		if(mouseButtonClick != 0) {
			mouseButtonClick = 0;
			handleAbuseClick(14);
		}
	}
	gameGraphics.drawText("Advertising websites", x3, y, 0, color14);
	y += 19; y2 += 19;
	gameGraphics.drawBoxEdge(40, y2, 140, 16, Colors.GREY);
	if(super.mouseX >= 40 && super.mouseX <= 180 && super.mouseY >= y2 && super.mouseY <= y2 + 16) {
		color4 = Colors.ORANGE;
		gameGraphics.drawBoxAlpha(40, y2, 140, 16, Colors.WHITE, 75);
		if(mouseButtonClick != 0) {
			mouseButtonClick = 0;
			handleAbuseClick(4);
		}
	}
	gameGraphics.drawText("Macroing or use of bots", 110, y, 0, color4);
	gameGraphics.drawBoxEdge(secondX[0], y2, 140, 16, Colors.GREY);
	if(super.mouseX >= secondX[0] && super.mouseX <= secondX[1] && super.mouseY >= y2 && super.mouseY <= y2 + 16) {
		color10 = Colors.ORANGE;
		gameGraphics.drawBoxAlpha(secondX[0], y2, 140, 16, Colors.WHITE, 75);
		if(mouseButtonClick != 0) {
			mouseButtonClick = 0;
			handleAbuseClick(10);
		}
	}
	gameGraphics.drawText("Offensive account name", x, y, 0, color10);
	y += 19; y2 += 19;
	gameGraphics.drawBoxEdge(40, y2, 140, 16, Colors.GREY);
	if(super.mouseX >= 40 && super.mouseX <= 180 && super.mouseY >= y2 && super.mouseY <= y2 + 16) {
		color5 = Colors.ORANGE;
		gameGraphics.drawBoxAlpha(40, y2, 140, 16, Colors.WHITE, 75);
		if(mouseButtonClick != 0) {
			mouseButtonClick = 0;
			handleAbuseClick(5);
		}
	}
	gameGraphics.drawText("Scamming", 110, y, 0, color5);
	gameGraphics.drawBoxEdge(secondX[0], y2, 140, 16, Colors.GREY);
	if(super.mouseX >= secondX[0] && super.mouseX <= secondX[1] && super.mouseY >= y2 && super.mouseY <= y2 + 16) {
		color11 = Colors.ORANGE;
		gameGraphics.drawBoxAlpha(secondX[0], y2, 140, 16, Colors.WHITE, 75);
		if(mouseButtonClick != 0) {
			mouseButtonClick = 0;
			handleAbuseClick(11);
		}
	}
	gameGraphics.drawText("Real-life threats", x, y, 0, color11);
	y += 19; y2 += 19;
	gameGraphics.drawBoxEdge(40, y2, 140, 16, Colors.GREY);
	if(super.mouseX >= 40 && super.mouseX <= 180 && super.mouseY >= y2 && super.mouseY <= y2 + 16) {
		color6 = Colors.ORANGE;
		gameGraphics.drawBoxAlpha(40, y2, 140, 16, Colors.WHITE, 75);
		if(mouseButtonClick != 0) {
			mouseButtonClick = 0;
			handleAbuseClick(6);
		}
	}
	gameGraphics.drawText("Exploiting a bug", 110, y, 0, color6);
	
	int cancelColor = Colors.WHITE;
	if(super.mouseX >= 200 && super.mouseX <= 315 && super.mouseY >= 290 && super.mouseY <= 305) {
		cancelColor = Colors.YELLOW;
		if(mouseButtonClick != 0) {
			mouseButtonClick = 0;
			showAbuseBox = 0;
		}
	}
	gameGraphics.drawText("Click here to cancel", x, 300, 1, cancelColor);
}

[/code]

Also in the mudclient class find

if (inputBoxType == 0 && showAbuseWindow == 0) gameMenu.keyDown(key);
and change it to

if (inputBoxType == 0 && showAbuseWindow == 0 && showAbuseBox == 0) gameMenu.keyDown(key);

finally in the mudclient class find

else if (showWelcomeBox) drawWelcomeBox();
right below it add

else if (showAbuseBox == 1) drawAbuseName(); else if (showAbuseBox == 2) drawSelectAbuse();

Then you’ll need to add this class in (it really helps with making GUIs)

[code=java]package org.rscdaemon.client;

public class Colors {
public static final int YELLOW = 0xffff00;
public static final int RED = 0xff0000;
public static final int GREY = 0x6D6D6D;
public static final int LIGHT_RED = 0xff9040;
public static final int GREEN = 65280;
public static final int BLUE = 255;
public static final int CYAN = 65535;
public static final int MAGENTA = 0xff00ff;
public static final int WHITE = 0xffffff;
public static final int BLACK = 0;
public static final int DARK_RED = 0xc00000;
public static final int ORANGE = 0xff9040;
public static final int ORANGE1 = 0xffb000;
public static final int ORANGE2 = 0xff7000;
public static final int ORANGE3 = 0xff3000;
public static final int ORANGE4 = 0xff8000;
public static final int GREEN1 = 0xc0ff00;
public static final int GREEN2 = 0x80ff00;
public static final int GREEN3 = 0x40ff00;
public static final int RANDOM = (int) (Math.random() * 16777215D);
}
[/code]

Please post what you think, I personally love this

Edit: Added in the Colors class, I forgot to add it, oops!

Read full topic
